alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 1:29PM PST until January 30 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 9 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If traveling or staying outside for extend periods of time, make sure to dress in layers and cover up exposed skin. Temperatures could be lethal for individuals that are underprepared and/or not protected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
